labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: A loading screen appears and a spinner is shown but it never goes away. Discord is attempting to open a non-existant channel and failing.
data.expected_result: Discord should show an error or just open the top-level channel
data.short_description: Clicking a Windows notification from a deleted channel will cause a never-ending loading screen
data.steps_to_repro: - Enter a server and click a text channel - Have another user send a message in a different channel - While the Windows notification is still on-screen, delete the channel the notification came from - Click the notification
